description:
Get the Absolute Nightmare Boxset here!
https://www.pixelempire.com/collections/upisnotjump/products/the-absolute-nightmare-boxset?variant=

I wrote this before the Fallout TV show came out on Prime, but it's funny how there's a lot of overlapping ideas. Fallout RUUUULES!

I am a bit critical in this video but I really quite like the Fallout: New DLC, quite a bit more than the Fallout 3 ones Which I also review here!:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NrG5olOLNOk&ab_channel=UpIsNotJump

Linkz

title: Fallout: New Vegas' DLC Is An Absolute Nightmare - This Is Why
